answers.answer: Hi, chronic intestinal pseudo-obstruction (CIPO) is a rare disorder that may be due to an underlying neuropathic disorder. Please check with your doctor to rule out diabetes. Diabetes can cause autonomic neuropathy and affect the digestive system, leading to problems with digestion and elimination. Medications to promote motility may help in emptying the intestines by promoting motility. You can discuss with your treating doctor regarding the excuse note. Regards.

question: I think this is what I have.  The recent colonoscopy showed no obstruction but I have symptoms related to this.  Bloating all the time and swelling of the belly and pain in the abdomen, constipation.  And I had vomiting during the prep for the colonoscopy.I have been called for jury duty and need a note to excuse me from this as I cannot sleep nor can I count on when I will be able to fall asleep.  It is ridiculous.
title: Chronic Intestinal Pseudobstruction
